content.raw: Asking just to be sure: I understand this is intended for optional use by teams who do not want to use ROS. The introduced new way of doing things (using runtime construction of scenarios, which we embrace for it´s flexibility) will stay as it is and is planned to continue to work until DRC trials?
content.html: Asking just to be sure: I understand this is intended for optional use by teams who do not want to use ROS. The introduced new way of doing things (using runtime construction of scenarios, which we embrace for it´s flexibility) will stay as it is and is planned to continue to work until DRC trials?
